languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт встречает вопрос испытующим взглядом.{/n} "Праздное любопытство заложено в природу {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}? Или же ты пытаешься выведать слабые места моего народа, дабы уничтожить еще один мир Детей Азуриана? Прости, элантах, но сейчас я не готова окунуть тебя в омут глубочайших тайн моих сородичей".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт встречает на вопрос испытующим взглядом.{/n} "Праздное любопытство заложено в природу {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}? Или же ты пытаешься выведать слабые места моего народа, дабы уничтожить еще один мир Детей Азуриана? Прости, элантах, но сейчас я не готова окунуть тебя в омут глубочайших тайн моих сородичей".

languages.text: {n}Yrliet regards you with an inquisitive look.{/n} "Is idle curiosity a defining feature of the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} or are you trying to learn about the weaknesses of my people so you can destroy another world of the Children of Asuryan? Forgive me, elantach, but I am not ready to immerse you in the fount of my people's deepest mysteries."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特以探询的目光看着你。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}总是这样喜欢无事好奇吗？还是说，你打算了解我的族人的弱点，以便摧毁阿苏焉子嗣的其他世界？很抱歉，外界人，但我并不打算告诉你我的族人最神秘的知识。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet regards you with an inquisitive look.{/n} "Is idle curiosity a defining feature of the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} or are you trying to learn about the weaknesses of my people so you can destroy another world of the Children of Asuryan? Forgive me, elantach, but I am not ready to immerse you in the fount of my people's deepest mysteries."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特以探询的目光看着你。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}总是这样喜欢无事好奇吗？还是说，你打算了解我的族人的弱点，以便摧毁阿苏焉子嗣的其他世界？很抱歉，外界人，但我并不打算告诉你我的族人最神秘的知识。”
{n}伊莉耶特以探询的目光看着你。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}总是这样喜欢无事好奇吗？还是说，你打算了解我的族人的弱点，以便摧毁阿苏焉子嗣的其他世界？很抱歉，外界人，但我并不打算告诉你我的族人最神秘的知识。”

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet regards you with an inquisitive look.{/n} "Is idle curiosity a defining feature of the mon-keigh or are you trying to learn about the weaknesses of my people so you can destroy another world of the Children of Asuryan? Forgive me, elantach, but I am not yet ready to immerse you in the fount of my people's deepest mysteries."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet te dedica una mirada inquisitiva.{/n} «¿Es la curiosidad repentina una característica básica de los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} o intentas descubrir las debilidades de mi gente para destruir otro de los mundos de los hijos de Asuryan? Discúlpame, elantach, pero no estoy preparada para sumergirte en la fuente de los misterios más profundos de mi pueblo».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet regards you with an inquisitive look.{/n} "Is idle curiosity a defining feature of the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} or are you trying to learn about the weaknesses of my people so you can destroy another world of the Children of Asuryan? Forgive me, elantach, but I am not ready to immerse you in the fount of my people's deepest mysteries."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet te dedica una mirada inquisitiva.{/n} «¿Es la curiosidad repentina una característica básica de los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} o intentas descubrir las debilidades de mi gente para destruir otro de los mundos de los hijos de Asuryan? Discúlpame, elantach, pero aún no estoy preparada para sumergirte en la fuente de los misterios más profundos de mi pueblo».

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは好奇の眼差しであなたを見つめている。{/n}「怠惰な好奇心が{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}の特徴なのか、それともアシュリアンの御子らの別の惑星を滅ぼすために我が民の弱点を知ろうとしているのか。許してくれ、エランタ。それでも我が民の最も深い神秘の源泉にお前を浸す用意はできていない」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet regards you with an inquisitive look.{/n} "Is idle curiosity a defining feature of the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} or are you trying to learn about the weaknesses of my people so you can destroy another world of the Children of Asuryan? Forgive me, elantach, but I am not ready to immerse you in the fount of my people's deepest mysteries."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは好奇の眼差しであなたを見つめている。{/n}「怠惰な好奇心が{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}の特徴なのか、それともアシュリアンの御子らの別の惑星を滅ぼすために我が民の弱点を知ろうとしているのか。許してくれ、エランタ。それでも我が民の最も深い神秘の源泉にお前を浸す用意はできていない」
{n}ユリエットは好奇の眼差しであなたを見つめている。{/n}「怠惰な好奇心が{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}の特徴なのか、それともアシュリアンの御子らの別の世界を滅ぼすために我が民の弱点を知ろうとしているのか？許してくれ、エランタ。だが、我が民の最も深い神秘の源泉にあなたを浸す用意はまだできていない」

languages.text: {n}Yrliet mustert dich einem fragenden Blick.{/n} "Ist bloße Neugier eine Eigenschaft, die allen {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} gemein ist, oder versucht Ihr nur, die Schwächen meines Volkes zu ergründen, damit Ihr eine weitere Welt der Kinder von Asuryan zerstören könnt? Vergebt mir, Elantach, doch ich bin nicht bereit, Euch in den Quell der tiefsten Mysterien meines Volkes eintauchen zu lassen."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet regards you with an inquisitive look.{/n} "Is idle curiosity a defining feature of the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} or are you trying to learn about the weaknesses of my people so you can destroy another world of the Children of Asuryan? Forgive me, elantach, but I am not ready to immerse you in the fount of my people's deepest mysteries."

Vergebt mir, Elantach, doch ich bin noch nicht bereit, Euch in den Quell der tiefsten Mysterien meines Volkes eintauchen zu lassen."

{n}Yrliet mustert dich einem fragenden Blick.{/n} "Ist bloße Neugier eine Eigenschaft, die allen {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} gemein ist, oder versucht Ihr nur, die Schwächen meines Volkes zu ergründen, damit Ihr eine weitere Welt der Kinder von Asuryan zerstören könnt? Vergebt mir, Elantach, doch ich bin noch nicht bereit, Euch in den Quell der tiefsten Mysterien meines Volkes eintauchen zu lassen."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet vous lance un regard inquisiteur.{/n} « La curiosité est-elle une caractéristique des {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} ou essayez-vous de découvrir les points faibles de mon peuple dans le but de détruire un autre des mondes des enfants d'Asuryan ? Pardonnez-moi, elantach, mais je ne suis pas encore prête à vous laisser boire à la source des mystères les plus profonds de mon peuple. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet regards you with an inquisitive look.{/n} "Is idle curiosity a defining feature of the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} or are you trying to learn about the weaknesses of my people so you can destroy another world of the Children of Asuryan? Forgive me, elantach, but I am not ready to immerse you in the fount of my people's deepest mysteries."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet vous lance un regard inquisiteur.{/n} « La curiosité est-elle une caractéristique des {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} ou essayez-vous de découvrir les points faibles de mon peuple dans le but de détruire un autre des mondes des enfants d'Asuryan ? Pardonnez-moi, elantach, mais je ne suis pas encore prête à vous laisser boire à la source des mystères les plus profonds de mon peuple. »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet sana kuşkuyla bakıyor.{/n} "Boş merak peşinde koşmak, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keighlerin{/g} yaradılışında mı var? Yoksa halkımın zayıflıklarını öğrenip Asuryan'ın Çocukları'na ait bir başka dünyayı yok etmenin mi peşindesin? Kusura bakma elantach ama halkımın en büyük gizemlerini sana sunmaya hazır değilim."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet regards you with an inquisitive look.{/n} "Is idle curiosity a defining feature of the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} or are you trying to learn about the weaknesses of my people so you can destroy another world of the Children of Asuryan? Forgive me, elantach, but I am not ready to immerse you in the fount of my people's deepest mysteries."
